SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope people realize teaching isn’t rocket science. In fact, it is harder…”

– Mrs. Barbara Scully, Kindergarten Educator @FCASD https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/teaching-harder-rocket-science/
